          <title>
            <string language="en">Making margarine from hydrogen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bilden der Margarine vom Wasserstoff</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fabrication de la margarine à partir de 
l'hydrogène</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fazendo o margarine do hidrogênio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Facendo margarina dall'idrogeno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατασκευή της μαργαρίνης από το υδρογόνο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fabricación de la margarina del hidrógeno</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram demonstrates how margarine is made by adding vegetable oil and hydrogen together.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reactions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">margarine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vegetable oil</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, wie Margarine gebildet 
wird, indem man den zusammen Pflanzenöl und Wasserstoff hinzufügt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme démontre comment la margarine est 
faite en ajoutant l'huile végétale et l'hydrogène ensemble.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama demonstra como o margarine é feito
adicionando o óleo vegetal e o hidrogênio junto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema dimostra come la margarina è fatta
aggiungendo l'olio vegetale e l'idrogeno insieme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα καταδεικνύει πώς η μαργαρίνη 
γίνεται με να προσθέσει το φυτικό έλαιο και το υδρογόνο από 
κοινού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama demuestra cómo la margarina es 
hecha agregando el aceite vegetal y el hidrógeno junto.</string>
          </description>
